channel.title: Keyboard on Enrico's Blog

item.title: ErgoDox keyboard
item.description: Now that I have a new blog setup, I can more quickly post what has been since long time in the making: my ErgoDox keyboard. It all started with me reading Steve Yeggeâ€™s blog on touch typing and being convinced I should give it a try with a proper keyboard. So on 2014-03-24 I joined a Massdrop purchase for an DIY ErgoDox split keyboard. It completed a week later and delivery was done somewhat end of May.
